hoverSkills: Hold your cursor over or click on the qualities

heroSection.intro-text: Hello, my name is Sebastian, and I'm
heroSection.title: Your new employee
heroSection.intro-text-explainer: With my smile and high spirit follows my ability to be a quick learner and high collaboration skills. I appreciate feedback and are not afraid of asking for help when needed... And of cause I always arive on time.

aboutMeSection.title: A 22-year old Multimedia Design-student with a high potential
aboutMeSection.info: I am a smiling, 22-year old student, who is born and raised in Randers and now live in Odder with my girlfriend Nikoline. I spend my free time with family, running and work on my personal project Planio, which is an app for daily planning. I am currently studying Multimedia Design in Viby and have a year left.

planioProject.title: Planio
planioProject.description: Planio shows my skills and ability to stand behind my work

cookiecareProject.title: Cookiecare.io
cookiecareProject.description: Made with Elementor under my internship at Brand by Hand

testimonialsSection.title: What does people say about me?

netto.title: Christian, Netto
netto.testimonial: Sebastian always arrives happy and smiling on work. He always takes any tasks positively, furthermore they are completed with quality. Sebastian is loved by his colleagues, Sebastian is flexible and are always ready to help, e.g. on holidays or colleagues being sick. My warmest recommendation shall Sebastian take with him. Sebastian will always be welcome to come back to Netto, if wanted by him.

whyMeSection.title: My top-10 personal skills
whyMeSection.info: Long texts can be boring, so I have summarised my most important qualities and personal skills here.
whyMeSection.motivatedDetail: I am always motivated in my work.
whyMeSection.goalOrientedDetail: I don't give up and will work wholeheartedly to make it work - no matter how many times it may fail.
whyMeSection.driveDetail: I love you challenges and have the will to change for the better.
whyMeSection.bigPotentialDetail: I can't do everything from the beginning, but with good, visual, training and the possibility to ask for help, I have a big potential.
whyMeSection.goodCollaborationSkilsDetail: A lot of tasks are best completed in groups - and that is totally fine.
whyMeSection.independentDetail: I can work alone - if I can ask for help when I need it.
whyMeSection.responsibleAndQualityConsciousDetail: I always do my best - and thrive to create quality under realistic responsibility.
whyMeSection.takePartInSocialActiviesDetail: I am no party-ape, but I love the company of others.
whyMeSection.quickLearnerDetail: Few things are easy but I refuse to give up before I have learned it. Often there is not much needed.
whyMeSection.lovePraiseAndCriticismDetail: I learn and evolve the most when I get praise and especially constructive criticism.

contactForm.title: Contact me
contactForm.expectAnswer: You can expect answers in less than 48 hours
contactForm.nameRequired: Please type a name or company name
contactForm.emailSendError: An error occured. Try again or please send the email manually, thanks.

CVPage.title: 22 years of life-experince
CVPage.downloadDACV: Click to download my CV - DA
CVPage.downloadENCV: Click to download my CV - EN
CVPage.aboutMe: I have drive and are not scared of development. When I am not with my family, running or in school, I work on Planio, that shows my skills and my ability to stand for my work. You can rest assured that you will get a colleague with a big potential, who is motivated to work for the company, and embraces challenges.

education.internship: Work --> Internship, Brand by Hand, Aarhus (current)
education.internshipInfo: Before I started on the internship, Brand By Hand hired me as a junior developer. My main tasks are web development in Wordpress and Elementor Pro. I have also gotten a few design tasks.
education.multimediadesignInfo: Further education, where I in 3. semester have chosen Frontend development. On the school we have been taught programming, design and UX-content.
education.stxInfo: Socialstudies A, Math A, Media studies (movies) C

workExperince.LiebeNordicInfo: I have been given responsibility from the start. I work with E-mail marketing and adaptation together with improvement of the webpages. Since I have not worked in this area before, I get even more practice in self-learning and problem solving. All work is mostly in Shopify with custom HTML and CSS adaptations.
workExperince.annesInfo: In Anne's there has been focus on customer contact and leaving the customers with a smile. I could prove again, that with the right, visual training can turn disadvantages in terms of cooking to strengths. It has also improved my social skills.
workExperince.nettoNewestInfo: Even though I turned 18, I was allowed to say in Netto. My boss had faith in me that I could take more responsibility in terms of new assignments and areas - and have the responsibility for the store in the evening. I got the opportunity to show that I was the right choice and I love to develop.
workExperince.nettoMiddle: Netto, young worker, Marsvej / Aarhusvej, Randers
workExperince.nettoMiddleInfo: After 10th class they asked me to come back - I was an obvious choice. And I stayed in Netto when they moved to Aarhusvej.
workExperince.nettoOldInfo: With no work experience I got a job in Netto. My personality was enough to get me hired and get the foot into industry of work. I was fast to prove that I left the customers with a smile and was able to complete the assignments with quality.

ITExperience.expoReactNativeInfo: I develop Planio with self-taught skills, which proves that I can make my dreams come alive.

expoReactNativeSkills.userDesign: Targeted design based on target group description.
expoReactNativeSkills.GooglePlayStore: Adding the app to Google Play Store
expoReactNativeSkills.encryptionAndDecryption: Encryption and decryption with React Native CryptoJS

ITExperience.reactViteTailwindInfo: My portfolio is created with React, Vite and Tailwind. The same goes with Planio Web-version.
ITExperience.adobeXDFigmaInfo: I have used Adobe XD or Figma for my projects in the free time and the projects in the school.
ITExperience.someInfo: I have had multiple YouTube channels, and on EAAA we have been taught in SoMe. Therefore, SoMe is not unknown to me. I am not shy behind a camera either.
ITExperience.AEInfo: As an early teenager I worked in After Effects for many years. I already had drive and the skill to learn new things self-taught.
